Element Event Delegation Module  2.8.2r1

Yahoo! UI Library > element-delegate
Search:
 
Filters

Module: element-delegate

Augments the Element Utility with a delegate method that facilitates easy creation of delegated event listeners. (Note: Using CSS selectors as the filtering criteria for delegated event listeners requires inclusion of the Selector Utility.)
Requires: element, event-delegate
